title: Advancing electrocatalytic reactions through mapping key intermediates to active sites via descriptors
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS01130E, Review Article
Xiaowen Sun, Rafael B. Araujo, Egon Campos dos Santos, Yuanhua Sang, Hong Liu, Xiaowen Yu
This review provides a systematic and comprehensive summary of the relevance of physical and chemical features mapping key reaction intermediates and their applications as descriptors in critical electrocatalytic reactions.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
